FuncDef: The statistics enable command enables traffic statistics collection on a Layer 2 sub-interface. The undo statistics enable command disables traffic statistics collection on a Layer 2 sub-interface. By default, traffic statistics collection is disabled on a Layer 2 sub-interface. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: 100GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,10GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,200GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,25GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,400GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,50GE Layer 2 sub-interface view,Eth-Trunk Layer 2 sub-interface view
ExtraInfo: To check the network status or locate network faults, you can enable traffic statistics collection on a Layer 2 sub-interface to collect traffic statistics on the Layer 2 sub-interface.
